Text: #G02# As a user, I want the DUNS validations to accept records whose ActionTypes are B, C, or D and the DUNS is registered in SAM, even though it may have expired.
#G02# As an Agency user, I want historical FPDS data loaded.
#G02# As an agency user, I want the FABS validation rules to accept zero and blank for non-loan records.
#G02# As an agency user, I want to get File F in the correct format.
#G02# As a Broker user, I want the D1 file generation to be synced with the FPDS data load, so that I don't have to regenerate a file if no data has been updated.
#G02# As an agency user, I want to use the schema v1.1 headers in my FABS file.
#G02# As a broker user, I want the historical FABS loader to derive fields, so that my agency codes are correct in the PublishedAwardFinancialAssistance table.
#G02# As a tester, I want to ensure that FABS is deriving fields properly through a robust test file plus a follow up check.
#G02# As a FABS user, I want to make sure the historical data includes all necessary columns, so that the information in the database is correct.
#G02# As a user, I want more information about how many rows will be published prior to deciding whether to publish.
#G02# As a broker team member, I want to derive FundingAgencyCode, so that the data quality and completeness improves.
#G02# As a UI designer,  I want to move on to round 2 of the Help page edits, so that I can get approvals from leadership.
#G02# As a tester, I want to have access to test features in environments other than Staging, so that I can test any nonProd feature in any environment.
#G02# As a Developer I want to quickly access Broker application data, so that I can investigate issues.
#G02# As an Owner, I want to design a schedule from the UI SME, so that I know the potential timeline of the UI improvements wanted.
#G02# As a broker team member, I want to ensure the Broker resources, validations, and P&P pages are updated appropriately for the launch of FABS and DAIMS v1.1.
#G02# As a user, I want the flexfields in my submission file to appear in the warning and error files when the only error is a missing required element.
#G02# As a FABS user, I do not want  DABS banner messages and vice versa, so that I have the appropriate information for my application.
#G02# As a Developer, I want to prevent users from double publishing FABS submissions after refreshing, so that there are no duplicates.
